response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your business operations and enhance your profitability. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $1,000,000 at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can be seamlessly integrated into your existing processes.", "product_price": 950000}
